explanations.reinforcement learning: The paper compares the Monte Carlo tree search (MCTS) method with model-free reinforcement learning methods like Q-learning, indicating a relevance to reinforcement learning.
explanations.deep learning: The paper mentions deep Q-network algorithm and deep-hedging methods, which are related to deep learning techniques.
explanations.neural network: Deep Q-network and deep-hedging methods involve neural networks, making this keyword relevant.
